page.title: 07TOWARD POINT FARM
page.content:
{The farm in general:} { Toward Point Farm (which used to be called Taynuilt Farm) is a family farm of 71.4 hectares run by Mr and Mrs Stirling and their two sons and two daughters. It is a Dairy farm with a large herd of Friesians and a small herd of beef Simmentals . They also keep hens but only for their own use. They grow potatoes to sell to a Dunoon (our local town) chip shop and turnips,hay and silage as winter feed for the cattle.
{Cont on page 8 { ============== { } {************
